                   java.lang.String consumerName,

    • Method Detail

      • deposit

        public void deposit​(double amount)
        This method is used to deposit money from account.

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw​(double amount)
              throws MinimumBalanceException
        This method is used to withdraw money from account. In account should be minimum of 500$.
        Parameters:
        amount - How much do you want to withdraw.
        Throws:
        MinimumBalanceException - this will thrown if you are not keeping minimum of 500$ in account.

        public double checkBalance()
        This method is used to check balance in the account.
